text:
Today, Kim Kardashian is celebrating her 37th birthday! The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star is older, and apparently wiser.

"Feeling like I found the meaning of life, finally!” she writes on her website.

You know the Kardashian clan goes all out for birthdays. So, how is Kim celebrating this year?

Kardashian is planning a "super low-key" celebration with Kanye West. A source tells E! News there will also be a brunch at mama Kris Jenner's house in Calabasas this weekend.

Low key? We’ll see about that.
title: This Is How Kim Kardashian Is Celebrating Her 37th Birthday

og.title: This Is How Kim Kardashian Is Celebrating Her 37th Birthday
og.description: Kardashian says it will be super low-key
